entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023
